description:
This 100 % recycled polyester base layer is environmentally conscious and highly functional. The 4-way stretch grid-textured fleece fabric provides excellent insulation by trapping heat close to your body, ensuring optimal warmth in harsh conditions. Additionally, the fabric's moisture-wicking properties efficiently draw sweat away from your skin, keeping you dry and comfortable throughout your physical effort.

To combat odors and bacteria buildup, we have incorporated the SilverClear® antimicrobial treatment. It ensures high efficacy against odors and bacteria to stay fresh even during extended wear.

The adjusted hood, featuring a YKK® reverse-coil front half zipper opening, offers versatility and allows for easy temperature regulation. You can tailor the hood to your preference, providing added comfort and protection from the elements when needed
name: Hooke Grid Base Layer Hoodie - Mens

specs.value: Made of 90% recycled polyester, 10% spandex 4-way stretch grid-textured fleece that trap heat and wick moisture
